sentences.en: All these acts are divisive and therefore impermissible.
sentences.cn: 这些都是破坏团结的行为,是不能容许的.
对个人隐私的非法侵犯

sentences.en: Cma argued that this shift went well beyond the knee of the curve and was therefore impermissible.
sentences.cn: “化学药品制造商协会”主张，这次转化顺利地超越了“曲线拐点”，因此是不允许的。

sentences.en: It is impermissible to be optimistic about the present condition of the manpower development.
sentences.cn: 我国现阶段人力资源开发的状况不容乐观.

sentences.en: It is impermissible to interfere in politics in the name of religion.
sentences.cn: 不得以宗教的名义来干预政治.

sentences.en: Slackness, procrastination, endless discussion without decision , and decision without implementation are all impermissible.
sentences.cn: 不能慢慢吞吞, 拖拖拉拉, 议而不决, 决而不行.

sentences.en: Such a state of affairs is entirely impermissible.
sentences.cn: 这种状态是完全不能容许的.

trans.tran_en: something that is impermissible cannot be allowed
